snippet: North Korean state television producers appeared to outdo themselves with a report on the frenzied reaction from the populace Thursday as the nation’s young leader, Kim Jong-un, inspected military units.
abstract: North Korean state television producers appeared to outdo themselves with a report on the frenzied reaction from the populace Thursday as the nation’s young leader, Kim Jong-un, inspected military units.

headline.main: North Koreans Fond of Leader, State TV Suggests
